attributes.action: Maths and English shouldn’t be taught in collage when you can focus on courses
attributes.additional_details:
Maths and English destroys lives and opportunities some people may never be able to pass maths and English this shouldn’t effect there life’s by getting bad jobs 
You could be really good at your course but people won’t want you because you don’t have maths and English and why’s that fair if their really good at the course. if people weren’t good at the course they can get thrown out or more likely they will drop out because they can’t do it because it’s not their sort of thing
attributes.background: The government shouldn’t force us to do maths and English in collage because it’s not fair on people

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/713471
